name: Guesstalt
description:
Fullscreen-mode highly recommended.

A thief has stolen a fragment of the Color Crystal, a shard that can create dimensional holes that can turn donuts into donut holes.
It is up to Detective Scoop to stop them and to secure this powerful artifact.

A/D (or left/right arrow keys) to move left and right.

W (or up arrow key) to jump, the player can double jump.

This is a submission for the Brackey's Game Jam 2020.1.
